file_content.text: I knew you'd come, Master Jedi!
Thank you, soldier! I knew they wouldn't leave us here!
Thank you! I think I heard other hostages on this floor, but I don't know if they're still here.
Oh thank you! I thought we were doomed!
It's about time they sent someone. Wait until the governor hears about this.
I knew they'd send someone. Thank you!
I never stopped believing they'd find a way to free us. Thank you.
